HotelElement.Name: Centara Ras Fushi Resort & Spa Maldives

Address.Address1: GIRAAVARU ISLAND, NORTH MALE ATOLL, MALDIVES

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Centara Ras Fushi Resort & Spa Maldives in Giravaru (North Male Atoll), you'll be within the vicinity of Villingili Public Beach and Laguna Beach. This 4-star resort is within the region of Vadoo Beach and Theemuge Palace.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 140 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Premium TV channels and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers body treatments and facials. After a day at the private beach, you can enjoy other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the resort's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge during limited hours.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Laguna Beach - 9.3 km / 5.7 mi
Vadoo Beach - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi

The preferred airport for Centara Ras Fushi Resort & Spa Maldives is Male (MLE-Male Intl.) - 12.8 km / 8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
